mapper.select: SELECT user_id userId, user_level userLevel, user_name userName, user_email userEmail, user_tel userTel, user_gender userGender, create_date createDate, user_active userActive, lastlogin_date lastloginDate FROM user ORDER BY create_date DESC;

SELECT user_id userId, user_level userLevel, user_name userName, user_email userEmail, user_tel userTel, user_gender userGender, create_date createDate, user_active userActive, lastlogin_date lastloginDate FROM user WHERE user_active = 'N' ORDER BY create_date DESC;

SELECT user_id userId, user_level userLevel, user_name userName, user_email userEmail, user_tel userTel, user_gender userGender, create_date createDate, user_active userActive, lastlogin_date lastloginDate FROM user WHERE user_active = 'Y' ORDER BY create_date DESC;
